HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: TD Find Library now has expansion filters AND MORE! - Royalty, including: -- Titles -- Permits -- Psyfocus - Ideology, including: -- Precepts -- Styles -- Guaranlen tree - Biotech, including: -- Mechanitor details -- Xenotype -- Genes - Other filters: -- Abilities (e.g. on cooldown) -- Time to bleed out -- Accessible materials via smelting/surgery/etc -- Prisoner filter has new options -- Grouping can check if "Any 2+" of these filters match -- Relation -- Schedule -- Reservation - Other junk: -- Icons for some filters, which look nice -- Some filters can match "Any" of an entire category so you can now check ANY bionic implant easier
TD Find Library has many new filters since release! - "Assign": outfit, food and drug policies. - Apparel Coverage and Layer - Filters for mods: LTO Groups and Real Fog of War visibilty
